seo.title: Our Strategy | Senghor University
seo.description: Discover Senghor University's Strategic Plan: our priority areas, objectives, and projects to support Africa's transformation.

hero.title: Our Strategy
hero.subtitle: Strategic Plan: Training tomorrow's leaders to transform Africa

plan.title: Strategic Plan
plan.summary: Senghor University's Strategic Plan defines our vision and ambitions for the next six years. It is structured around five major strategic axes that will guide our actions and investments to train Africa's leaders of tomorrow.

axes.title: Our Strategic Axes
axes.subtitle: Three pillars to support Africa's transformation

a1.title: Train, Innovate and Research
a1.description: Strengthen academic excellence, develop research and innovate in our teaching methods.

a2.title: Govern, Cooperate and Digitize
a2.description: Modernize governance, strengthen partnerships and accelerate digital transformation.

a3.title: Radiate, Undertake and Impact
a3.description: Extend our international reach, support entrepreneurship and maximize our societal impact.
a3.objective2: Support for entrepreneurship and professional integration

fundraising.title: Fundraising
fundraising.subtitle: Our priority projects to support our development

scholarships.title: Excellence Scholarships
scholarships.description: Fund scholarships for deserving students from disadvantaged backgrounds.

campus.title: Campus Extension
campus.description: Build new buildings to accommodate more students.

research.title: Research Center
research.description: Create a research center dedicated to African development challenges.

library.title: Digital Library
library.description: Develop a digital library accessible to all our campuses.

cta.title: Become a Partner
cta.text: Join us in our mission to train Africa's leaders of tomorrow. Your support makes a difference.
